titleStmt.title: The dignitie of the Scripture togither with the indignity which the vnthankfull world offereth thereunto In three sermons vpon Hose. 8. 12. By Samuel Hieron.
titleStmt.author: Hieron, Samuel, 1576?-1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Legat printer to the Vniuersitie of Cambridge. 1607. And are to be sold [in London] at the signe of the Crowne in Pauls Church-yard by Simon VVaterson,

notesStmt.note: At least some copies have an errata slip pasted on A2 verso--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: London] at the signe of the Crowne in Pauls Church-yard
